com.box.sdk

Class BoxGroup

  • Object
    • BoxResource
      • BoxCollaborator
        • BoxGroup

  • @BoxResourceType(value="group")
public class BoxGroup
extends BoxCollaborator
    Represents a set of Box users.

    Unless otherwise noted, the methods in this class can throw an unchecked BoxAPIException (unchecked meaning that the compiler won't force you to handle it) if an error occurs. If you wish to implement custom error handling for errors related to the Box REST API, you should capture this exception explicitly.

                                        String provenance,

                                        String description,
                                        String invitabilityLevel,
                                        String memberViewabilityLevel)

        Parameters:
        api - the API connection to be used by the group.
        name - the name of the new group.
        provenance - the provenance of the new group
        externalSyncIdentifier - the external_sync_identifier of the new group
        description - the description of the new group
        invitabilityLevel - the invitibility_level of the new group

      • getAllGroupsByName

        public static Iterable<BoxGroup.Info> getAllGroupsByName(BoxAPIConnection api,
                                                         String name)
        Gets an iterable of all the groups in the enterprise that are starting with the given name string.
        Parameters:
        api - the API connection to be used when retrieving the groups.
        name - the name prefix of the groups. If the groups need to searched by full name that has spaces, then the parameter string should have been wrapped with "".
        Returns:
        an iterable containing info about all the groups.

      • getAllGroupsByName

        public static Iterable<BoxGroup.Info> getAllGroupsByName(BoxAPIConnection api,
                                                         String name,
                                                         String... fields)
        Gets an iterable of all the groups in the enterprise that are starting with the given name string.
        Parameters:
        api - the API connection to be used when retrieving the groups.
        name - the name prefix of the groups. If the groups need to searched by full name that has spaces, then the parameter string should have been wrapped with "".
        fields - the fields to retrieve.
        Returns:
        an iterable containing info about all the groups.

      • addMembership

        @Deprecated
public BoxGroupMembership.Info addMembership(BoxUser user,
                                                         BoxGroupMembership.Role role)
        Deprecated. use addMembership(BoxUser user, BoxGroupMembership.GroupRole role) instead.
        Adds a member to this group with the specified role.
        Parameters:
        user - the member to be added to this group.
        role - the role of the user in this group. Can be null to assign the default role.
        Returns:
        info about the new group membership.

      • addMembership

        public BoxGroupMembership.Info addMembership(BoxUser user,
                                             BoxGroupMembership.GroupRole role)
        Adds a member to this group with the specified role.
        Parameters:
        user - the member to be added to this group.
        role - the role of the user in this group. Can be null to assign the default role.
        Returns:
        info about the new group membership.

      • addMembership

        @Deprecated
public BoxGroupMembership.Info addMembership(BoxUser user,
                                                         BoxGroupMembership.Role role,
                                                         Map<BoxGroupMembership.Permission,Boolean> configurablePermissions)
        Deprecated. use addMembership(BoxUser user, GroupRole role, Map<BoxGroupMembership.Permission, Boolean> configurablePermissions) instead.
        Adds a member to this group with the specified role.
        Parameters:
        user - the member to be added to this group.
        role - the role of the user in this group. Can be null to assign the default role.
        configurablePermissions - the configurable permission of the user as a group admin. Can be null to give all group admin permissions.
        Returns:
        info about the new group membership.

      • addMembership

        public BoxGroupMembership.Info addMembership(BoxUser user,
                                             BoxGroupMembership.GroupRole role,
                                             Map<BoxGroupMembership.Permission,Boolean> configurablePermissions)
        Adds a member to this group with the specified role.
        Parameters:
        user - the member to be added to this group.
        role - the role of the user in this group. Can be null to assign the default role.
        configurablePermissions - the configurable permission of the user as a group admin. Can be null to give all group admin permissions.
        Returns:
        info about the new group membership.
